headlines.description: Declan Rice scored his first West Ham goal as Arsenal's top four hopes took a huge hit with defeat.
headlines.shortLinkText: Rice nets first West Ham goal to down Arsenal

headlines.description: Mohamed Salah's second half penalty was enough to get Liverpool back to winning ways with a 1-0 win over Brighton
headlines.shortLinkText: Salah penalty earns Liverpool win at Brighton

headlines.description: Burnley beat Fulham 2-1 at Turf Moor on Saturday thanks to two own goals to make it three straight league wins for Sean Dyche's side.
headlines.shortLinkText: Fulham sunk by two own goals at Burnley

headlines.description: Bottom club Huddersfield Town ended their eight-match losing streak in the Premier League with a goalless draw at fellow strugglers Cardiff.
headlines.shortLinkText: Huddersfield end losing run with draw at Cardiff

headlines.description: LONDON, Jan 12 (Reuters) – Watford substitute Tom Cleverley volleyed a brilliant 74th-minute winner as they came from behind to beat Crystal Palace
headlines.shortLinkText: UPDATE 1-Soccer-Watford come from behind to win at Palace

headlines.description: Southampton moved out of the relegation zone with a 2-1 win over Leicester City despite playing half the match with 10 men.
headlines.shortLinkText: Ten-man Southampton win away at Leicester

headlines.description: Goals from Pedro and Willian earned Chelsea a hard-fought 2-1 win over Newcastle.
headlines.shortLinkText: Chelsea beat Newcastle to widen gap to Arsenal
